title: Rare images reveal active sunspots minutes before they unleashed powerful X-flares that caused November 2025's stunning auroras
description: We don't often get a good look at X-class solar flares from ground-based observatories.
content: We don't often get a good look at X-class solar flares from ground-based observatories.
